label: "Look after my folks" : Navy Relief Society official relief organization of the U.S. Navy cares for the Navy's widows and orphans subscriptions received by any bank or the Emergency Fund Committee 280 Broadway, New York City.

metadata.label: Call Number
metadata.value: priWWI_XL_32

metadata.label: Creator
metadata.value: Brangwyn, Frank, 1867-1956, artist.;American Lithographic Co., printer.

metadata.label: Date
metadata.value: approximately 1917

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: Prints, advertising; Image of an American sailor calling out and pointing from a ship deck, with four sailors holding poles behind him, and sinking, damaged ships and smoke visible in the ocean in the background; the poster promotes giving to the Navy Relief Society of the United States Navy during World War I.
